transcript: I woke up around four o'clock in the morning just about every day part of that came because I started in the fitness industry and I was doing that anyways also because I didn't have to talk to anyone until about 10 a.m and so that gave me about six hours of uninterrupted work time that I could really move projects for so that means the first thing I did every morning was I would wake up and I would start working and at the end of the day if I look at a Year everyone else who's competing against me is still working in their business but if I wake up at three o'clock or four o'clock in the morning and I can work three or four hours until eight o'clock or nine o'clock I get more done in that period of time than most those guys are getting done in a week
